item.title: Raw Mango Chutney - Andhra Style
item.description: Raw mango chutney is a flavorful condiment made with raw mangos, coriander leaves, onions and some spices. Raw Mango Chutney is a must-try recipe when raw mangoes are in season. Raw mangoes are packed with minerals and vitamins and are good to beat the summer heat. This raw mango chutney aids digestion and enhances the taste, aroma and nutrition of any dish.
